Name: District service cabinets.
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to district service cabinets.
Text:
Int. No. 156

By Council Members Lander, Kallos and Rosenthal

..Title
A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to district service cabinets.
..Body

Be it enacted by the Council as follows: 
      Section 1. Subdivision a of section 2705 of the New York city charter is amended to read as follows:
      a. There shall be a district service cabinet within each community district established pursuant to this chapter. The members of the district service cabinet shall include:
      (1) The agency officials designated pursuant to paragraph one of subdivision f of section twenty-seven hundred four;
      (2) Representatives of other agencies that provide local services on a regular basis in the community district, who shall be the ranking line official assigned to the district, a representative of the department of design and construction, and a representative of the office of environmental remediation;
      (3) Each council member whose district comprises all or part of the community district;
      (4) A representative of the department of city planning designated by the director of city planning;
      (5) The district manager appointed pursuant to subdivision f of section twenty-eight hundred; and,
      (6) The chairperson of the community board for the community district or his or her representative.
      ï¿½2. This local law shall take effect ninety days from its enactment.

Int 890/2012
1/24/14

\pard\cbpat2\ltrpar\fi720\sl480\slmult0\qj\cf1 Section 1. Subdivision a of section 2705 of the New York city charter is amended to read as follows:\fs27\par
\fs24 a. There shall be a district service cabinet within each community district established pursuant to this chapter. The members of the district service cabinet shall include:\fs27\par
\fs24 (1) The agency officials designated pursuant to paragraph one of subdivision f of section twenty-seven hundred four;\fs27\par
\fs24 (2) Representatives of other agencies that provide local services on a regular basis in the community district, who shall be the ranking line official assigned to the district\ul , a representative of the department of design and construction, and a representative of the office of environmental remediation\ulnone ;\fs27\par
\fs24 (3) Each council member whose district comprises all or part of the community district;\fs27\par
\fs24 (4) A representative of the department of city planning designated by the director of city planning;\fs27\par
\fs24 (5) The district manager appointed pursuant to subdivision f of section twenty-eight hundred; and,\fs27\par
\fs24 (6) The chairperson of the community board for the community district or his or her representative.\fs27\par
\fs24\'a72. This local law shall take effect ninety days from its enactment.\fs27\par
